title: `spack setup` is just plain broken
body:
`spack setup` does not work.  For posterity, here is a relatively simple example of it not working.  Looking inside `setup.py`, I barely recognize what I see:

1. `spack setup` was originally derived directly from the `spack diy` code; but now the two look nothing alike.

2. `spack setup` ends up concretizing the spec twice.  When specs take about a minute to concretize, that can be a serious problem.  It could also be a cause of the problem below.

3. It looks like changes were made to `install.py` without corresponding changes to `setup.py` (or `diy.py`).

I'll see what I can do; this Issue is posted to document that whatever fix I come up with actually solved a problem.
